long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bacon May Die is a quirky and intense 2D brawler that features a cast of bacon characters engaging in fast-paced, bacon-fueled combat. Developed by SnoutUp, this game offers a delightful mix of humor, action, and chaotic battles as you control your bacon hero to defeat enemies and bosses.

Game Controls
Arrow Keys or WASD: Move your bacon hero.
Mouse: Aim your weapon.
Left Mouse Button: Attack and unleash bacon-fueled mayhem.
Right Mouse Button: Perform special moves.
Spacebar: Jump to avoid enemy attacks.

How to Play
Choose Your Bacon Hero: Pick your favorite bacon character, each with its unique abilities.
Bacon vs. Enemies: Engage in frenetic battles against waves of enemies using your bacon prowess.
Boss Battles: Confront powerful bosses, each with distinct attack patterns and strategies.
Unlock Weapons: Discover and unlock a variety of weapons, from melee to firearms, to enhance your bacon arsenal.
Survival Mode: Test your skills in survival mode, facing endless waves of enemies for high scores.

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
